h3_title: The Zodiac Village of the Painted Realm
content: Another bat is hiding up ahead on the left in front of a Celestial Pear Tree, but with its back turned you can sneak up and unleash a charged strike first -- so long as you watch out for the Frozen Corpses around it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Chen Loong' and the sub-subsection 'The Zodiac Village of the Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
Another bat is hiding up ahead on the left in front of a Celestial Pear Tree, but with its back turned you can sneak up and unleash a charged strike first -- so long as you watch out for the Frozen Corpses around it.
